dialog: Hi Medi, can you explain to me what periodontitis is?
Of course! Periodontitis is a serious gum infection that damages the soft tissue and destroys the bone that supports your teeth.

Research suggests that there is an association between periodontitis and poor cardiovascular health. Inflammation caused by periodontitis may contribute to the development of cardiovascular diseases.
Is there anything I can do to prevent periodontitis?
Yes, maintaining good oral hygiene is key. Brushing your teeth twice a day, flossing regularly, and visiting your dentist for check-ups can help prevent periodontitis.
That's good to know. Does periodontitis have any other health implications?
Yes, it has been linked to conditions such as diabetes, respiratory diseases, and pregnancy complications.
